类 Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • Util
  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    updated on 2021/4/21: added the function of verify e-mail and password format updated on 2021/4/21: added the function of record current user updated on 2021/5/18: added the function of creating ImageIcon updated on 2021/5/18: added the function of verifying bank account format updated on 2021/5/18: added the function of read text file into a string array updated on 2021/5/20: added the funciton of recording Video times and userType

    • 方法详细资料

      • readFile

        public static java.util.List<Member> readFile()
        Read the information of a List array from a text file
        返回:
        List Member array that contain all the members

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile​(java.util.List<Member> memberList)
        Write the information of a List array into a text file
        参数:
        List - Member array that contain all the members
        返回:
        boolean, indicating whether the writing of file is successful.

      • StringToArrayList

        public static java.util.List<Member> StringToArrayList​(java.lang.String str)
        Store the information of members that read from a text file into arrayList
        参数:
        String - the string that contain all the information of all the members
        返回:
        List arrayList that contain all the members

      • recordCurrentUser

        public static void recordCurrentUser​(Member member)
        Record the current user of the online gym
        参数:
        member - the member object represent that user

      • passwordFormat

        public static int passwordFormat​(java.lang.String password)
        Verify the format of a new password
        参数:
        pasword - the password choose by user
        返回:
        int value indicate the verified outcome,1=success,0=require both number and character,-1=lenth less than 6

      • emailFormat

        public static int emailFormat​(java.lang.String email)
        Verify the format of a new email(must included @)
        参数:
        email - the email choose by user
        返回:
        int value indicate the verified outcome,1=valid,0=invalid

      • accountFormat

        public static boolean accountFormat​(java.lang.String bankaccount)
        Verify the format of a new email
        参数:
        bankaccount - the bankaccount inputed by user
        返回:
        boolean indicate wheter it is valid

      • readFromFile

        public static java.lang.String[][] readFromFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        Read information from a file and store it in a String array
        参数:
        String - the path of the file
        返回:
        String[][] String array that contain all the information

      • readLine

        public static int readLine​(java.lang.String filename)
        Returning how many lines are there in a given file
        参数:
        String - the path of the file
        返回:
        int, how many lines are the file.
